name: *$89 Special!  BOSTONS BEST!!* Minutes to Center*
neighborhood_overview:
Architecturally interesting, historic, diverse, and quiet residential neighborhood. Racially, culturally, ethnically, and economically diverse.

Restaurants, Full service market, beer Wine Store are all within a 15-20 minute walk from the apartment
